thread.title: Most popular Halloween candy in each state, 2015
thread.title_full: Most popular Halloween candy in each state, 2015 - seattlepi.com

author: seattlepi.com
title: Most popular Halloween candy in each state, 2015
text:
Related Stories Halloween candy: Then and now Halloween candy we love and hate Heathier Halloween candy options Halloween is almost upon us, and for most kids that means one important thing–candy.
But good candy is a very subjective thing; one trick-or-treater's trash could be another kid's treasure. Product reviews site, Influenster, set out to find the candy that makes most kids happy in each state.
The site surveyed over 40,000 Influensters to find out which Halloween candies hold a special place in their hearts.
Here's what they found:
The candy the pulled the highest total number of votes turned out to be Reese’s Peanut Butter Cup -- it was one of only three candies (the other two were Kit Kat and Butterfinger) to be voted by every single state in the U.S. The candy of choice in the most number of states this year turned out to be the polarizing Halloween staple–Candy corn. "It was interesting to see that the standout candy of choice in the most number of states was the ever-controversial, you-either-love-it-or-hate-it Halloween staple, the candy corn," Aydin Acar, Cofounder and CEO of Influenster told Mashable . "However, it was not surprising to see that Reese's Peanut Butter Cups pulled the highest total number of votes."
Click through the slideshow above to see a few of the most popular candies by state and some odd picks, and visit Influenster for the full report.
For even more on this sweet study, check out Mashable's interview with the Cofounder and CEO of Influenster
